TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit HashAlgorithm extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable, class System.Security.Cryptography.ICryptoTransform
Public MustInherit Class HashAlgorithm Implements ICryptoTransform
type HashAlgorithm = class interface IDisposable interface ICryptoTransform

summary.span: 表示所有加密哈希算法实现均必须从中派生的基类。

span.span: Represents the base class from which all implementations of cryptographic hash algorithms must derive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 哈希函数是现代加密的基础。Hash functions are fundamental to modern cryptography. 这些函数将任意长度的二进制字符串映射到称为哈希值的固定长度的小型二进制字符串。These functions map binary strings of an arbitrary length to small binary strings of a fixed length, known as hash values. 加密哈希函数具有是无法以计算方式找到哈希处理为相同的值的两个不同的输入的属性。A cryptographic hash function has the property that it is computationally infeasible to find two distinct inputs that hash to the same value. 哈希函数通常用于使用数字签名和保持数据完整性。Hash functions are commonly used with digital signatures and for data integrity. 哈希用作表示大量的数据的固定大小的唯一值。The hash is used as a unique value of fixed size representing a large amount of data. 如果相应的数据也匹配，则应与匹配的两个数据集的哈希。Hashes of two sets of data should match if the corresponding data also matches. 中大型无法预测的哈希值变化的数据结果的小改动。Small changes to the data result in large unpredictable changes in the hash. ## Examples 下面的代码示例计算数组的哈希。The following code example computes the hash for an array. 此示例假定是预定义的字节数组`dataArray[]`。This example assumes that there is a predefined byte array `dataArray[]`. 是的一个派生的类。 is a derived class of . [!code-cpp[Classic HashAlgorithm Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic HashAlgorithm Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic HashAlgorithm Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic HashAlgorithm Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HashAlgorithm Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic HashAlgorithm Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是对的简单调用方法。This method is a simple call to the method. 调用`Dispose`允许使用的资源类可以重新分配用于其他目的。Calling `Dispose` allows the resources used by the class to be reallocated for other purposes. 有关详细信息`Dispose`，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。For more information about `Dispose`, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

remarks.format: ## Examples 以下示例计算哈希值的字符串，并返回为 64 个字符的十六进制格式的字符串的哈希。The following example computes the hash value of a string and returns the hash as a 64-character, hexadecimal-formatted string. 此代码示例所创建的哈希字符串适用于任何 SHA256 哈希函数 （在任何平台上），创建一个 64 个字符的十六进制格式的哈希字符串。The hash string created by this code example is compatible with any SHA256 hash function (on any platform) that creates a 64-character, hexadecimal-formatted hash string. remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，使用此重载哈希算法的实现。By default, this overload uses the implementation of a hash algorithm. 如果你想要指定不同的实现，使用重载，它可以改为指定算法名称。If you want to specify a different implementation, use the overload, which lets you specify an algorithm name, instead. 加密配置系统定义的默认实现。The cryptography configuration system defines the default implementation of .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 释放 类的当前实例所使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 `Dispose` 后，应调用 。Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the . `Dispose` 方法使 处于不可用状态。The `Dispose` method leaves the in an unusable state. 在调用`Dispose`，必须释放对所有引用这样垃圾回收器才能收回内存的占用。After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)并[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 `Dispose` 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法由公共`Dispose()`方法和`Finalize`方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the `Finalize` method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. `Finalize` 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。`Finalize` invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写时，请小心不要引用在早期调用之前释放对象。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关详细信息并，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，将写入对象的数据路由到哈希算法以计算哈希值。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, routes data written to the object into the hash algorithm for computing the hash.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由应用程序代码不调用此方法。This method is not called by application code. 此抽象方法执行计算哈希值。This abstract method performs the hash computation. 每次写入到加密流对象通过此方法传递的数据。Every write to the cryptographic stream object passes the data through this method. 对于每个数据块，此方法更新哈希对象的状态，因此该数据流的末尾返回的正确哈希值。For each block of data, this method updates the state of the hash object so a correct hash value is returned at the end of the data stream.

Protected MustOverride Function HashFinal () As Byte()

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，在加密流对象处理完最后的数据后完成哈希计算。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, finalizes the hash computation after the last data is processed by the cryptographic stream object.
The computed hash code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法完成任何部分计算并返回该数据流的正确哈希值。This method finalizes any partial computation and returns the correct hash value for the data stream.

summary.span: 表示哈希计算的状态。

span.span: Represents the state of the hash computation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此字段用于防止用户更改加密哈希算法的密钥哈希操作过程。This field is used to prevent users from changing the key of a keyed hash algorithm during a hash operation. 密钥更改合法时，此字段的值为零之前和之后的哈希操作。When a key change is legitimate, the value of this field is zero both before and after a hash operation. 当密钥的更改不是合法的时则此字段的值为非零值。When a key change is not legitimate, the value of this field is nonzero.

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.IDisposable.Dispose() cil managed

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由公共 dispose （） 方法和 Finalize 方法调用此方法。This method is called by the public Dispose() method and the Finalize method. Dispose （） 调用受保护的 dispose （boolean） 方法释放参数设置为 true。Dispose() invokes the protected Dispose(Boolean) method with the disposing parameter set to true. 完成调用 Dispose disposing 设置为 false。Finalize invokes Dispose with disposing set to false. 当处置参数为 true 时，此方法释放任何托管对象所持有的所有资源，此的引用。When the disposing parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法将调用每个被引用对象的 dispose （） 方法。This method invokes the Dispose() method of each referenced object. **继承者说明：****Notes to Inheritors:** Dispose 可以由其他对象调用多次。Dispose can be called multiple times by other objects. 当重写 dispose （boolean），注意不要引用已经释放的早期调用到 Dispose 中的对象。When overriding Dispose(Boolean), be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed in an earlier call to Dispose. 有关如何实现 dispose （boolean） 的详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information about how to implement Dispose(Boolean), see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). 有关 Dispose 和 Finalize 的详细信息，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)并[重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v%3dvs.100))。For more information about Dispose and Finalize, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v%3dvs.100)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须调用方法之前调用方法。You must call the method before calling the method. 在检索最后一个哈希值之前，必须调用这两种方法。You must call both methods before you retrieve the final hash value. 若要检索的最后一个哈希值之后调用方法，获取字节数组中包含属性。To retrieve the final hash value after calling the method, get the byte array contained within the property. 调用使用不同的输入和输出数组的方法会导致。Calling the method with different input and output arrays results in an . ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法替换方法进行哈希字符串。The following code examples use the method with the method to hash a string. public: virtual cli::array <System::Byte> ^ TransformFinalBlock(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ inputBuffer, int inputOffset, int inputCount);
abstract member TransformFinalBlock : byte[] * int * int -> byte[] override this.TransformFinalBlock : byte[] * int * int -> byte[]

param.name: inputBuffer
param.span: 要计算其哈希代码的输入。

span.span: The input to compute the hash code for.

param.name: inputOffset
param.span: 字节数组中的偏移量，从该位置开始使用数据。

span.span: The offset into the byte array from which to begin using data.

param.name: inputCount
param.span: 字节数组中用作数据的字节数。

span.span: The number of bytes in the byte array to use as data.

summary.span: 计算指定字节数组的指定区域的哈希值。

span.span: Computes the hash value for the specified region of the specified byte array.

returns.span: 一个数组，该数组是输入中计算了哈希值的部分的副本。

span.span: An array that is a copy of the part of the input that is hashed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须调用方法后调用方法，但在之前检索最后一个哈希值。You must call the method after calling the method but before you retrieve the final hash value. 请注意，此方法的返回值不是哈希值，但只有一份的输入数据经过哈希处理的一部分。Note that the return value of this method is not the hash value, but only a copy of the hashed part of the input data. 若要检索最后一个哈希运算值之后调用方法，请获取字节数组中包含属性。To retrieve the final hashed value after calling the method, get the byte array contained in the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法替换方法进行哈希字符串。The following code examples use the method with the method to hash a string.
